name: TellyUploaderBot
description: Telegram's best Open Source Url Uploader Bot. Create your Fork now.

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Your Any Own Private Channel ID Where Your Bot As Admin With Full Permission

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: For Force Subscribe. Paste your Update channel ID

DEF_THUMB_NAIL_VID_S.description: Add It For M3u8 Link thumbnail and For default thumbnail to be used in the videos. Incase, yt-dlp is unable to find a thumbnail. If Not add M3u8 link Will Not Work

BROADCAST_AS_COPY.description: Value Will Be True or False
